recipe.name: Pork Adobo
recipe.preparation: Marinate pork (substitute chicken) in all ingredients for 1-2 hours. Simmer in saucepan for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.  Simmer on low until sauce becomes thick and meat becomes tender.  Add salt and pepper as needed.
recipe.notes: I can't say this is all that authentic, but it is rather tasty.  The end product ends up a bit salty -- using low  sodium soy sauce may  rectify this some.  Originally from the Epiphany School Lady's Guild, Linda Desimone presiding.  Recipe by Clarita Camaquin.
